name: Runemagic Series Adventure One: The Secret River
overview: A role-playing adventure game in which you must first create a character and then travel through the caves to find and drink from a magical green river. You will encounter trolls, elves and other enemies on your journey. The Character Generator program should be loaded first. Once you create your character and save it, you can then load the game itself and load in your previously saved character. It was developed by M Latto (coding) and A Crick (graphics) with artwork by A Lawes
